description: Classic-fitting pants with a straight leg and a high rise. Made from Japanese cotton twill. Washed for softness.
fitting_details: Classic fit with a straight leg and a high rise.
Size 32W has a 12¼" rise and an 18½" leg opening.
Belt loops. Button fly with a buttoned closure.
Two front angled pockets. Right hip coin pocket. Back right buttoned pocket. Back left welt pocket.
